name: Green-on-Black for TwitchTV (N0Lif3) 1/2014 update
description:
A very very simple "Green-text, Black-background" skin for Twitch.TV. If you encounter any issues or have any improvements, please make a discussion post and fill me in. If I like it, I'll update this style accordingly.

If you like my 4chan theme and want to show thanks in a direct way, take a look at my amazon wishlist:
http://www.amazon.com/gp/registry/37K8UB06OM1HQ/
additional_info:
This skin works on just about any website out there on the internet, just change the domain name to your preferred website. I use this very style for a few other websites.

UPDATE 3/28/2013
Updated for the new new theme of TwitchTV, I removed the sidebar on the left side and made it so the video player fills your entire screen.

UPDATE 1/17/2014
For some reason, the video player was really small now. I fixed it so it's big again.
